Articles.Content:
It is possible to achieve the speed of light in KSP (and even surpass it); with the help of mods or without. I think that a mod should be made which induces the effect of relativistic time dilation on objects moving close to the speed of light:

 

- If your ship moves close to the speed of light, the rest of the world is automatically subjected to (physical) timewarp

- If you switch to a ship that moves at a slow speed, the fast object will have its time slowed

 

The speed of light should of course be changeable, but either the real speed of light or a tenth of it (to fit with other Kerbal dimensions) should function as defaults.
